mapper.select: select a.*,c.project_id,c.name projectname,e.name keshi ,d.patient_project_id,d.state from tb_patient a,tb_project_combo b,tb_project c,tb_patient_project d,tb_param e where a.combo_id=b.combo_id and b.project_id=c.project_id and d.project_id=c.project_id and c.param_id=e.param_id and a.code=#{onecode } order by e.name

select distinct * from tb_brief a,tb_detail_project b,tb_detail c where a.detail_id=b.detail_id and time= (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `tb_group` ) and b.detail_id=c.detail_id and b.project_id=#{0 } and a.patient_id=#{1 }

select a.*,b.project_id proid,c.* from tb_brief a,tb_detail_project b,tb_detail c,tb_patient d where a.detail_id=b.detail_id and time= (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `tb_group` ) and b.detail_id=c.detail_id and a.patient_id=d.patient_id and d.code=#{onecode } order by c.type desc
